articles.title: Anthropic Launches Advanced AI Model for Autonomous Business Tasks
articles.summary: **Anthropic** has released **Claude 4.5**, an advanced AI model capable of independently building **software** and handling complex business tasks. The new version represents a significant upgrade in autonomous capabilities compared to previous iterations.

timeline.event: Anthropic launches Claude 2 AI assistant model
Claude 3 released with major capability upgrades
Claude 4.5 debuts with autonomous software development
Expected enterprise integration and business deployment

articles.title: European Union Reinstates Sanctions Following Iran's Nuclear Non-compliance
articles.summary: The **European Union** has officially reinstated **sanctions** against **Iran** following similar actions by the **United Nations**. The decision comes in response to Iran's continued non-compliance with the nuclear agreement terms.

timeline.event: Iran nuclear deal (JCPOA) signed with powers
US withdraws from nuclear deal under Trump
EU reinstates sanctions over nuclear violations
IAEA deadline for Iran compliance review

articles.title: Global Copper Crisis Deepens as Supply Chain Issues Mount
articles.summary: A deadly mining accident in **Indonesia** and **China's** first production decline in nearly a decade have sparked a global **copper** shortage. Prices jumped to **$4.76** per pound, rising **4.1%** in one week.

timeline.event: China reports first copper production decline since 2015
Fatal collapse at Grasberg mine in Indonesia
Copper prices surge to $4.76 per pound
Global copper deficit expected to reach 500,000MT

articles.title: EU Energy Systems Face Growing Climate Change Threats
articles.summary: The **European Environment Agency** warns that **EU** energy systems are increasingly vulnerable to **heatwaves** and droughts. Rising cooling demands pose significant challenges to infrastructure stability and energy security across Europe.

timeline.event: Record European heatwave strains power grid systems
Nuclear plants reduce output amid cooling water
EEA warns about climate threats to energy
EU infrastructure adaptation plan deadline approaches

articles.title: Global Study Maps Major Plastic Pollution Hotspots
articles.summary: **Citizen scientists** have identified critical **plastic pollution** hotspots worldwide through comprehensive data collection and mapping. The study reveals concerning concentrations in **coastal regions** and major **urban centers**.

timeline.event: UN launches Clean Seas global plastic reduction campaign
Citizen science plastic tracking app launches worldwide
Global plastic pollution hotspot map released publicly
UN plastic pollution treaty final negotiations deadline

articles.title: Trump Proposes 100% Tariff on Foreign-Made Films
articles.summary: Former President **Donald Trump** announced plans to impose a **100% tariff** on foreign-made movies if elected. The proposal, shared on **Truth Social**, would significantly impact international film distribution in the **U.S. market**.

timeline.event: Trump initiated trade tariffs against China films
Trump announces 100% tariff plan on Truth Social
Major studios expected to challenge tariff proposal
Policy implementation possible if Trump wins election

articles.title: AI-Powered Ransomware Emerges as Major Security Threat
articles.summary: Security experts warn of rising **AI-powered ransomware** attacks threatening global cybersecurity. The new generation of malware uses **machine learning** to bypass traditional security measures and target **critical infrastructure**.

timeline.event: First AI-enhanced malware detected in dark web
Major hospital networks targeted by smart ransomware
AI ransomware bypasses traditional security defenses globally
New AI security standards expected from NIST

articles.title: Moldova's Pro-EU Party Claims Historic Election Victory
articles.summary: The **Party of Action and Solidarity** secured a parliamentary majority in **Moldova**, defeating pro-Russian opposition. The victory in **Chisinau** marks a significant shift toward European integration and away from **Moscow's** influence.

timeline.event: Moldova declares independence from Soviet Union
Maia Sandu wins presidential election
PAS party wins parliamentary majority
Expected formal EU membership application review

articles.title: Breakthrough in Quantum Computing Error Correction Achieved
articles.summary: Scientists have developed new **quantum error correction codes** enabling efficient scaling to **hundreds of thousands** of **qubits**. The breakthrough represents a major step toward practical quantum computing applications.

timeline.event: Google claims quantum supremacy with 53 qubits
IBM demonstrates first error mitigation techniques
New quantum error correction codes breakthrough announced
First practical quantum computer expected deployment

articles.title: Cannabis-Based Drug Shows Promise for Back Pain Relief
articles.summary: Clinical trials reveal **VER-01**, a cannabis-derived drug, effectively treats chronic **lower back pain** without serious side effects. The **breakthrough treatment** shows no signs of addiction risk in patient studies.

timeline.event: Initial clinical trials begin for VER-01 drug
Phase I safety trials show promising results
Phase II trials confirm pain relief effectiveness
Expected FDA approval decision for VER-01

dailyGreeting: Good morning! AI and global challenges shape today's news.

historicalEvents.description: Henry IV becomes King of England after deposing Richard II
Mozart's opera The Magic Flute premieres in Vienna
Munich Agreement signed, giving Nazi Germany parts of Czechoslovakia
Botswana gains independence from British rule
